headline: Jim Cramer on Edison International: “I Think it’s a Little Higher Risk”
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shared insight on. Noting the stock is down 31% since the January California fires, a caller asked Cramer whether it is a buy. In response, he said: “Yeah, I am going to have to punt on that. headline: Edison International (EIX) Declares Dividends on Series A and B Preferred Stocks
summary: On August 28, 2025, Edison International (EIX) and Southern California Edison announced preferred dividends, reinforcing their shareholder commitment. Over the past month, Edison International's stock rose 4%, aligning with the broader market's positive trend and the market's 2% increase over the last 7 days. The company also reported on July 31, a mixed earnings report with an increase in net income for the first half of the year but a decline in quarterly net income. Meanwhile, market...
